Welcome to the documentation for…

radar is a Python library intended to teach the user basics of radar signal processing as to prototype for Software-Defined Radio (SDR) design.

Check out the Installation section for further information, including how to install the project.

radar has its documentation hosted on Read the Docs.

Note

This project is under active development.
